Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 39th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2019, off Harold Buehler (WAS)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 4/12/2019...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 4/14/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2019, hitting .630 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 5/21/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2019, hitting .410 with 3 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Atlanta on 9/29/2019...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 5/31/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2020, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
